content: Just created an account so that I could comment on how turned off I was by this article. I took a few months off from The Ringer after the the election. I popped back in today to hear a 27 year old Brandeis graduate in a tweed jacket with a faked British accent tell me that he is afraid of sounding American, the alt-right is Nazism, and that he is the cool irreverent voice the next generation of wayward teens is looking for. Huge miss by the Ringer, the author, and the subject, for me anyways. I’m done with this site. See you on the podcast Bill.
